description: The combination of FOREST_, FOREST_ID, MAPSHEET and SRC_FILENAME is a unique identifier across all counties. All four are needed to create the unique id that traces back to the source polygon.
Translation runs countOfNotNull for the two forest layers. If one layer, returns SINGLE_LAYERED, if two layers returns MULTI_LAYERED.

Counts number of layers based on the presence of a not null value for attributes representing each layer. Custom function decides if NFL layer is present based on rules in NFL table. Validation returns UNKNOWN_VALUE is NUM_OF_LAYERS is zero.
